summary: Iteration 3 integrates the Flatline findings without regressing the previously-approved fixes; the chain linearization/uniqueness, timestamp split, fail-closed safeguards, single-entry mutation coupling, reputation resolution, Phase C tightening, and pgaudit/partition-trigger defense-in-depth are all specified in an operationally sound way.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: append() concurrency could fork the hash chain (no DB-enforced linearization)
previous_issues_status.notes: Still fixed: SERIALIZABLE + per-domain_tag pg_advisory_xact_lock + audit_trail_head sequencing remains a clear linearization mechanism.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Prune plan contradicted append-only enforcement and implied trigger disablement
previous_issues_status.notes: Still fixed: pruning is partition detach/drop with explicit 'triggers are NEVER disabled' plus checkpoint anchoring and continuity verification.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Append-only enforcement via RLS/privileges was claimed but not defined
previous_issues_status.notes: Still fixed and strengthened: explicit RLS policies, explicit role separation (app not owner), and least-privilege statements remain consistent with the design.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Quarantine did not define in-flight request behavior (fail closed vs buffer vs partial apply)
previous_issues_status.notes: Still fixed: governance-critical mutations rejected with 503 + Retry-After; non-critical telemetry explicitly routed outside the hash chain during quarantine; runbook added.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: actor_id trust boundary underspecified; actor_id nullable allowed unauthenticated entries
previous_issues_status.notes: Still fixed: actor_id is NOT NULL + non-empty CHECK; resolveActorId() throws if no authenticated identity; service identity is mTLS-derived; JWT verification requirements are stated.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: DynamicContract loader failure modes and override controls were underspecified
previous_issues_status.notes: Still fixed and improved: startup failure matrix is explicit; override blocked in production and size-limited; monotonic expansion violations are fatal; CI/CD config gate + checksum + canary reduce outage risk while preserving fail-closed semantics.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: append() hashing inputs used non-deterministic timestamps, breaking idempotency on retry
previous_issues_status.notes: Still fixed: event_time is caller-provided and included in hash; created_at is server-generated and excluded from hash; retry determinism is preserved.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Version negotiation authority was ambiguous between local logic and hounfour
previous_issues_status.notes: Still fixed: validateCompatibility() remains the sole authority (delegated to hounfour), with explicit mixed-version tests and contract.json CI-only.
